about_the_game:
Sanguine tells the story of Yona, a cursed warrior in her quest for revenge as she battles her way through a dry medieval world filled with blood powered machines.
Expect advanced combat involving weapon switching, blood ability, intense boss fight and explore a complex world with a rich narrative to follow.

Project Background

Developed initially as a student graduation project, we decided to continue working on it hoping to release it one day. We're a group of 3 passionate artists who love inventing unique worlds, characters, fun gameplay mechanics or just creating games of all kinds.


The Future of Sanguine

  • A playable demo of Sanguine release in September
  • Devlogs for a deeper look at the project development
  • A Discord Server for play-testing and feedback
Sanguine is still very early in development, but if you are interested you can follow us to witness the evolution of the project. Join the community, it would mean a lot to us !


Thank you for any kind support!

content_descriptors.notes: Serious game with a narrative importance of blood and of the human body
